澑字的基本解释

澑
liū
古同“溜”。

澑
liù
古同“溜”。

澑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liù］
［《廣韻》力救切，去宥，來。］
亦作“澑1”。
(1)古水名。
(2)水流。
(3)用以指瀑布。
(4)流；淌。
(5)湍急。
(6)用以指急流。
(7)瞥视；扫视。
(8)圆转；滑溜；流利。
(9)练，活动。
(10)传唤。
(11)量词。串；条；排。用以表示成串、成条、成排的事物。
(12)某一地点附近的地方。
(13)方言。用石灰、水泥等涂抹、堵糊缝隙。
(14)通“霤”。屋檐滴水处。
(15)通“遛”。漫步，慢慢走。
[②]［liū］
亦作“澑2”。
(1)滑动；滑落。
(2)偷偷地走；悄悄地走。
(3)顺手窃取；偷偷地拿。
(4)随顺；顺着。
(5)一种烹调法。微煮一下或经油炸后再加芡粉。
(6)词缀。用在形容词之前或之后，多叠用。
[③]［liú］
［《集韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
亦作“澑3”。
见“溜3火”。

澑字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澑； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页652第07
【正字通】同溜。

澑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
澑字的起名意思

暂无。

Lonely
Basic explanation of words
Lonely
liū
Gu Tong "slid".
Lonely
liù
Gu Tong "slid".
Lonely
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liù］
["Guangyun" tries to save Qi, go to You, come. ]
Also known as "澑1".
(1) Ancient water name.
(2) Water flow.
(3) Used to refer to waterfalls.
(4) Flow; drip.
(5) Rush.
(6) Used to refer to rapids.
(7) Glance; glance.
(8) Round; slippery; fluent.
(9) Practice, activity.
(10) Summons.
(11) Quantifiers. String; bar; row. It is used to express things in strings, strips, and rows.
(12) A place near a certain place.
(13) Dialects. Use lime, cement, etc. to smear and block the gaps.
(14) Through "slipping". Water drips on the eaves.
(15) Through "walking". Walk, walk slowly.
[②]［liū］
Also known as "澑2".
(1) Sliding; sliding off.
(2) Go secretly; go quietly.
(3) Steal easily; take it secretly.
(4) Follow along; follow along.
(5) A cooking method. Slightly boil or deep-fry before adding gorgon powder.
(6) Affixes. Used before or after adjectives, use more overlap.
[③] [liú]
["Jiyun" strives to cut, Pingyou, come. ]
Also known as "澑3".
See "Slide 3 Fire".
Lonely
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　澑; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 652 07
【Zhengzitong】Same slip.
